name: Weekend Sandbox 1: A Boss Battler
description:
Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • J - Attack

Just playing around with game design concepts and ideas.

 Design Ideas:

  • Snappy animation and attack response helps with providing better game feel
  • Using blue and orange tones to help set the mood 
  • Using off-colours and character silhouettes to provide easy identification
  • Character facing up towards to enemy and player model is seen from the back gives natural feel that the player is the bottom character
  • Bounce back on wall or armor hit shows impact on hit

Features and Assets:

  • Unity 2020.1.15f1
  • Unity Timeline to create intro cinematic
  • Unity ProGrids and ProBuilder
  • Dog Knight PBR Polyart
  • Mini Legion Grunt PBR HP Polyart
  • UMotion for custom animations
  • Lux URP
  • Hovl Studio
  • Easy Character Movement
  • Low Poly Ultimate Pack
